thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.dialaflight.com
thread.title: R Peace

author: R Peace
title: R Peace
text:
Thank you Karl and all the team for the arrangements you made for my wife and me recently when I visited Florida. From my first contact to the day before the flight, nothing was too much trouble. They even managed to get me the seats I wanted at no cost.
I've now asked Karl to arrange another flight and car hire for me and feel confident that I will get the best price and service yet again.
